channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL Compass2.0
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL Compass2.0

item.title: CVE-2022-42447|2024-08-03T13:10:40.873Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20compass2.0
item.description: HCL Compass is vulnerable to Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS). This vulnerability can allow an unprivileged remote attacker to trick a legitimate user into accessing a special resource and executing a malicious request.
